title: Admissions Open for 2025!
content: The University of Sindh has opened admissions for the 2025 session. Apply online before July 15th!

title: New Research Center Inaugurated
content: A new research center for Artificial Intelligence and Data Science was inaugurated at the main campus.

title: Annual Sports Gala Announced
content: Get ready for the Annual Sports Gala! Registrations are open for all departments.
